Dialogue.Page: Mod: Band Together Authors: pikpik, Etherpod, Ditzy, TheHipOne
Band Together is a mod made for the third mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. It takes place on a planet with four divided tribes.
The player's main goal is to unite the four tribes together to figure out how to open a long-locked ancient door.
While the mod was left in an unfinished state by the jam deadline, updates followed and fixed the mod, turning it into the wonderful mod it is today.
While it didn't win any awards, it is an experience worth trying!
